MainPage.welcome-bitmap-desc: Discover and download the latest games from indie developers to major publishers and play them.
MainPage.api-error: Unable to fetch data from the API.

Authentication.bitmap-id-desc: To use all Bitmap services, please sign in or sign up.
Authentication.developer-account-confirm-true: Request to register as a developer.
Authentication.developer-account-confirm-false: Sign up as a regular account. You can switch to a developer account later in account settings.
Authentication.is-developer: Are you a developer or artist?
Authentication.is-developer-desc: Register your Bitmap ID as a developer or artist account to publish games.
Authentication.teammate-account-confirm-true: Request to register as a Bitmap teammate.
Authentication.teammate-account-confirm-false: Sign up as a regular account. You can switch to a teammate account later in account settings.
Authentication.is-teammate-desc: Register your Bitmap ID as a teammate account to publish your own artwork. (Authorization required)
Authentication.email-rules: Please enter a valid email address.
Authentication.username-rules: Username must be between 3 and 15 characters.
Authentication.login-required: Bitmap services requires Bitmap account. Please click the Sign In button in the sidebar to sign in first.
Authentication.login-notification: By continuing, you agree to our User Agreement and acknowledge that you understand the Privacy Policy.
Authentication.email-verification: Almost done. We have sent a verification code to your email. Please enter it within 10 minutes.
Authentication.email-verification-incomplete-top: , your Bitmap ID email verification has not been completed.
Authentication.email-verification-incomplete-desc: Email verification is incomplete. Please click the Send Verification Email button below to proceed with email verification.
Authentication.require-id-pw: Please enter both username and password.
Authentication.failed-query-by-uid: Unable to find user by UID.

AccountPermissions.bitmap-apply-desc: Join the Bitmap team to enjoy all the services we provide. Click the Join button below to apply.
AccountPermissions.bitmap-quit-desc:
Leaving the Bitmap team. Please note the following restrictions when you lose your teammate status:

1. Access to the Bitmap community (KakaoTalk open chat, Discord server teammate roles) will be restricted.
2. You will no longer be able to post or edit content on Bitmap's social media (YouTube, Bitmap site, etc.).
3. If you leave due to excessive conflict, details may be disclosed in the conflict log without prior notice.
AccountPermissions.bitmap-developer-enable-desc: Switch to Bitmap Developer account to publish your own apps such as games or use the Bitmap API.

BitmapTeammate.name: Name / Alias
BitmapTeammate.motivation: How did you hear about Bitmap and what motivated you to apply? (Max 400 characters)
BitmapTeammate.working-field: Please select your fields of multimedia production. (Multiple selections possible)
BitmapTeammate.prod-tools: What multimedia production programs do you mainly use? (Max 100 characters)
BitmapTeammate.affiliation: Are there any groups (teams, studios, companies, etc.) you belong to or have belonged to? Please specify your current status.
BitmapTeammate.work-submission: Please upload the work you are most passionate about or think is your best.

GamesView.author: Author
GamesView.will-be-removed: will be uninstalled. This operation cannot be undone.
GamesView.macos-unsupported-platform: is not playable for Mac. But in case, if you are using Apple Silicon Mac for iOS support, or have emulator installed for Windows and Android support, you may play this game. Do you want to install anyway?
GamesView.rate-delete-desc: Are you sure you want to delete this review? This action cannot be undone.

GameSubmit.stored-view-required-context-alert: A red asterisk (*) indicates a required field.
GameSubmit.gameIdDesc: The Game ID will be generated automatically.
GameSubmit.gameTitleDesc: This is the title that will be displayed on the store's main page.
GameSubmit.gameLatestRevisionDesc: Please enter the latest version of the game. This value is used to manage updates. This field ONLY allows number
GameSubmit.gamePlatformDesc: Please select the platforms that this game supports. This value determines the installability for each platform.
GameSubmit.gameEngineDesc: This is the game engine used for this game, which will be displayed on the store's detail page.
GameSubmit.gameGenreDesc: This is the game genre that will be displayed on the store. Separate genres with commas.
GameSubmit.gameDeveloperDesc: Please enter the person, group, team, or company that developed this game.
GameSubmit.gamePublisherDesc: Please enter the distributor or exhibition name that is distributing this game.
GameSubmit.isEarlyAccessDesc: Is this game in early access and not the final released version?
GameSubmit.isReleasedDesc: Has this game been released with appropriate download links uploaded? If not selected, the store will block the game's download.
GameSubmit.gameReleasedDateDesc: This is the early access or official release date of the game that will be displayed on the store.
GameSubmit.gameWebsiteDesc: This is the official website of the game to which the store can redirect.
GameSubmit.gameVideoURLDesc: This is the official YouTube trailer video of the game that will be displayed on the store. If the URL is https://youtu.be/abcdefg or https://youtube.com/watch?v=abcdefg, enter 'abcdefg'.
GameSubmit.gameDownloadURLDesc: This is the link to the game file used when downloading the game from the store. Any link without ads, such as OneDrive or Google Drive, can be used.
GameSubmit.gamePosterDesc: This is the main poster of the game that will be displayed on the store. (1:1.414 aspect ratio recommended, up to 10MiB uploadable)
GameSubmit.gameBannerImageDesc: This is the image that will be displayed in the game list on the main page. (16:9 aspect ratio recommended, up to 10MiB uploadable)
GameSubmit.gameIconImageDesc: This is the icon image that will be displayed in the game search window and the game list in the library. (1:1 square image, up to 10MiB uploadable)
GameSubmit.gamePreviewImageDesc: This is the preview image that will be displayed on the store. (16:9 aspect ratio recommended, up to 10MiB uploadable)
GameSubmit.gameBinaryNameDesc: This is the name of the game's executable file that the store will identify and run after installation. Do not include the file extension.
GameSubmit.gameHeadlineDesc: Please enter a one-liner that represents the game.
GameSubmit.gameDescriptionDesc: Please provide a detailed description of the game.
GameSubmit.edit-md-desc: Use Markdown syntax to write a detailed description of the game.
GameSubmit.submitting: Completing submission of the following game:
GameSubmit.submit-warning: After admin review, your game will be added to the official game library. Click the submit button to complete the submission.
GameSubmit.editing: Completing editing of the following game:
GameSubmit.edit-warning: Click the edit button to complete the editing.
GameSubmit.mobile-publish-warning: You are attempting to publish from a mobile device.
GameSubmit.mobile-publish-warning=desc: Some features may not be supported when publishing games from a mobile device. Please try again on a PC or Mac.
GameSubmit.submit-succeed: The game has been successfully submitted and is pending approval.
GameSubmit.edit-succeed: The game has been successfully edited.
GameSubmit.not-developer: Not a developer account. Please log in with a developer account and try again.
GameSubmit.not-author: Not the author of this game. You cannot edit or register a new one.

Common.bitmap-server-inaccessible: Bitmap Store couldn't reach to server. Please check your internet connection.
Common.decode-failed: Bitmap Store couldn't interpret the data from server.

Footer.copyright-bitmap: Copyright © 2026 Bitmap Production. All Rights Reserved.
Footer.bitmap-about: Bitmap Production | Platina | Mail: public@prodbybitmap.com | Hosting service provided by Bitmap Production. | This service is non-commercial and managed by an individual, not a corporation or business.

About.bitmap-overview-desc: We create new value at the intersection of technology and art.\nJoin us on a journey to turn creators' imaginations into reality.
About.what-is-bitmap: Bitmap is a versatile team focused on video producers, 3D motion graphics and animation creators, music producers, and developers.
About.our-portfolio: From video to development, Bitmap is a versatile collaboration of experts across fields. Discover Bitmap's unique portfolio born from the fusion of 3D animation, sound design, and code.
About.start-of-bitmap: At the end of 2017, three video producers (BuIuD, Mat, Platina) planned and formed the team in July 16, 2018.
About.origin-of-name: The origin of the team name comes from when BuIuD, Mat, and Platina were planning the team. Mat suggested MBP (a derivative of MVP), but Platina proposed BMP (the extension for bitmap graphic files), which was accepted.
About.start-with-bitmap: Start creating something new with Bitmap right now.
